text:
Ah yeah! Today we're going to learn English 
with a hilarious clip from The Big Bang Theory.

Now before we start, every week we release 
lessons to help intermediate and advanced

learners just like you to improve their English in 
a fun and dynamic way and understand fast-speaking

natives without getting lost, without 
missing the jokes, and without subtitles!

So if you’re new here, make sure you join our 
community of over five million learners by hitting

that subscribe button and the bell down below! 
That way, you won’t miss out a single new lesson.

Now as you can see, improving your vocabulary is a 
very important pillar to achieve English fluency.

If you want to learn a ton of the vocabulary 
that we natives really use every day I recommend

you check out our Fluent with Friends course.
You will also learn how natives reduce, cut and

connect the sounds. If you’re tired of boring old 
traditional methods that don’t actually work to

make you fluent, then you will love this course!
You can start learning today with our FREE 3-part

masterclass. So just click up here or down 
in the description below to sign up now!

All right! I hope that you've been 
having a good time with today's lesson.
Now how about testing your knowledge?

I hope you enjoyed today's lesson. 
To keep learning with The Big

Bang Theory then watch this one next. 
Let's check out a clip from that.
